name: SigmaGrid
description: SigmaGrid provides paid, institutional-grade fundamentals and regime context for synthetic-equity perpetual markets.

capabilities.description: Consolidated fundamentals and signal context for a given ticker, including core fields and optional macro sensitivity metrics.
Cross-venue premium and basis metrics relative to reference values.
Directional drift indicators derived from underlying signal dynamics.
Market regime classification and associated risk context metrics.
Scheduled macro and event-driven context associated with a given ticker.
Funding, carry, and relative pricing context metrics.
Historical time-series data for a given ticker.
Aggregated snapshot view across multiple tickers.

payments.notes: Endpoints may return HTTP 402 with payment instructions.
